resources.string: This app was not made to save drivers from parking ticketing. It was made to save some time and money if a driver illegally parked by a mistake. Respect the rules, please.
Tap the button to set «Parked» status.
Tap the button to set «Parked» status off.
Hold the button to spread the alarm.
Save the car from the tow truck! EvaqAlarm — is the community-driven tow trucks alarm system.
Server is unreachable, check your connection settings
Can’t get coordinates, check your GPS settings
Are you sure that alarm was wasted and the car is safe?

EqvaqAlarm – is a great app
isn’t it?
It worth to give
5 stars to it,
to make newcomers see it!

EvaqAlarm works best
when being used
by a big community.
Share it among
your friends!

Sorry this version
is too outdated
and is unusable.
Please, update
the application.
